Develop a mobile app that helps students learn through interactive games and quizzes.
Introduce project-based learning where students work on real-world problems and present their solutions to the class.
Create a mentorship program where older students can guide younger ones in their studies.
Implement a flipped classroom model where students watch video lectures at home and complete homework in class.
Establish a community service component where students volunteer in their local communities while also learning important life skills.
